goal.ch: 身處於 ”後基因體” 時代，大量的實驗數據與研究都發表與儲存在不同的數據庫中。如何利用已有的生物資訊的工具，取得與使用這些大量的資訊已成為今日從事生物醫學研究的人員所必備的能力。本課程將著重於手把手的運用現有且多樣的生物資訊工具，以幫助學生自身研究的進行。
goal.en: Living in the “post-genomic“ era, a vast amount of experimental data and research are published and stored in various databases. How to utilize existing bioinformatics tools to access and utilize this wealth of information has become an essential skill for researchers in biomedical fields today. This course will focus on hands-on use of a variety of existing bioinformatics tools to assist students in advancing their own research.

outline.ch:
1.Introduction to post genomics era
2.NCBI genome project and PubMed
3.Genome annotation
4.Genome browser
5.Sequence analysis tools, “Ape”, “VectorNTI”, etc
6.PCR primer design, “Primer3”, “oligo”, etc
7.Sequence alignment ＆ BLAST, “ClustalW”, “EMBL-EBI website”
8.Microarray and tiling array
9.MID-TERM EXAMINATION
10.Next Generation Sequencing (I)
11.Next Generation Sequencing (II)
12.GO term analysis, “GORILLA”
13.Motif analysis, “meme”, “HOMER”
14.UCSC genomic database, and NCBI GEO database
15.Model organism database: “FlyBase”, “WormBase”, “modENCODE”, “ZFIN”, “MGI”
16 ＆ 17.Student’s practice
18.Final test“
